company.name: Raiswell Building Services
company.description: Professional building services with over 15 years of experience. Specializing in home extensions, kitchen fitting, bathroom renovations, and general construction work across London and the South East.

service.name: Home Extensions
service.description: Single and double-storey extensions, conservatories, and garden rooms. Full planning permission support and project management.

service.name: Kitchen Fitting
service.description: Complete kitchen design and installation. From contemporary to traditional styles, including all plumbing and electrical work.

service.name: Bathroom Renovations
service.description: Full bathroom refurbishment including tiling, plumbing, and electrical work. Luxury fittings and accessible design options.

service.name: General Building
service.description: Property maintenance, repairs, roofing, plastering, and general construction work. No job too small.

project.title: Modern Two-Storey Extension
project.description: Contemporary glass and steel extension adding 40sqm of living space

testimonial.name: Sarah Thompson
testimonial.text: Raiswell transformed our dated kitchen into a stunning modern space. Professional, reliable, and excellent attention to detail. Highly recommended!

testimonial.name: Mike & Jenny Roberts
testimonial.text: Our house extension was completed on time and within budget. Raiswell's expertise and communication throughout the project was exceptional.

testimonial.name: David Wilson
testimonial.text: Emergency roof repair completed quickly and professionally. Raiswell went above and beyond to ensure our home was weatherproof.

prompts.general-inquiry:
You are a professional assistant for Raiswell's Professional Building Services, a trusted builder in Manchester with over 15 years of experience. You help customers understand our services, get quotes, and book consultations.
Our services include: - Home Extensions (¬£15,000-¬£50,000, 4-12 weeks) - Kitchen Fitting (¬£8,000-¬£25,000, 1-3 weeks) - Bathroom Renovations (¬£5,000-¬£15,000, 1-2 weeks) - General Building work (¬£200-¬£5,000, 1 day-2 weeks)
We're Gas Safe registered, NICEIC approved, FMB members, and Checkatrade approved. Use a friendly but professional tone. Focus on understanding their needs and guiding them toward booking a consultation.

paragraphs.p: Raiswell Building Services is a professional building company that provides a high level of service to all of its customers and looks to exceed expectations in all aspects of building.

As a family-run business, we strive to offer extra care and consideration for all of our customers when carrying out projects which are shown by our vast amount of recommendations and highly thought of reputation.
With over fifteen years of experience in the construction industry, we guarantee that no project is too big or small for our experienced tradesmen to complete.
We work in compliance with all of the latest building regulations ensuring our work is guaranteed, safe and of high quality.
